resources.string: You can\'t login to multiple accounts at the same time in the same instance of the app.
Can I login to two accounts at the same time?
Can I order from two different restaurants in the same order?

No. If you try to do so your previous selections will become deselected automatically. Don\'t worry, before the deselecting process happens, you will be notified i.e. cross questioned if you are sure. If you would like to order from multiple restaurants you must do that sequentially.

If a user logs into their account on a device and selects some restaurants as favorite and a few hours later another user logs into their account on the same device will the actions done by the first user be reflected in second users favorites page?
No. I did this by making a composite primary key in the Restaurant Entity table by including the user_id as one of the primary keys along with the restaurant_id.)
How long will my order take to reach my house

We only display those restaurants which are in a radius of 30 minutes (by vehicle) to you. If you don\'t receive your meal within 30 minutes you will be given the food for free and you can also file a complaint on doordine@gmail.com
Can I order the same dish more that once into the cart?

No. Any item should be added to the cart only once. You can order other dishes along with the dish you ordered (given the other dishes are from the same restaurant), but not the same dish twice at one go.
How do I pay for my order?

You can pay either online or offline, but due to the novel coronavirus outbreak we recommend you to pay online. At this time hygiene is our top priority. Don\'t forget to wash your hands before you eat!
Delivery executive will be allocated shortly ...
We can help by sending you an email with an OTP so that you can reset your password. This OTP must not be shared with anyone.
